titles.title: District of Columbia Fiscal Year 2011 Local Funds Continuation Act
Continuing appropriations of local funds of the District of Columbia during fiscal year 2011.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Appropriations.

bill.summary: 3/2/2011--Introduced. District of Columbia Fiscal Year 2011 Local Funds Continuation Act - Amends the Continuing Appropriations Act, 2011 to authorize the District of Columbia to continue to expend local funds for certain programs and activities through FY2011.
